title: Tokenization
content: Tokenization is the process of converting text into smaller units called tokens. For example, 'I love AI' becomes ['I', 'love', 'AI'].

title: Web APIs
content: A Web API allows applications to communicate over HTTP. For example, a FastAPI endpoint can receive a POST request and return a JSON response.

title: Language Models
content: Language models like GPT-4 generate human-like text by predicting the next word given a prompt.
